translations: 剥夺……继承权（disinherit 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: The man cast off his prodigal son and disinherited him.
sentences.translation: 老人缎盔了与他的不肖儿赜赌关系-并炳夺了他的继逞权。

sentences.sentence: Hart's good-bad man was always an outsider, always one of the disinherited.
sentences.translation: 哈特扮演的被误为坏人的好人总是一个局外人，总是一个被剥夺继承权的人。

sentences.sentence: Article 7 a successor shall be disinherited upon his commission of any one of the following ACTS.
sentences.translation: 第七条继承人有下列行为之一的，丧失继承权。
